v8:item.v8:content: The paid amount (in the contract currency).

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN Not RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.Quote IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND Not PaymentSchedule.Quote IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (NOT RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.Quote IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (NOT RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND Not PaymentSchedule.Quote IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed AND DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderInProcess, CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS ForPayment, DocumentSalesOrder.Ref, DocumentSalesOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentSalesOrder.Number, DocumentSalesOrder.Date, DocumentSalesOrder.Posted, DocumentSalesOrder.Author, DocumentSalesOrder.BankAccount, DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentSalesOrder.OperationKind, DocumentSalesOrder.WorkKind, DocumentSalesOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentSalesOrder.PriceKind, DocumentSalesOrder.ShipmentDate, DocumentSalesOrder.Contract, DocumentSalesOrder.Closed, DocumentSalesOrder.SetPaymentTerms, DocumentSalesOrder.PettyCash, DocumentSalesOrder.Comment, DocumentSalesOrder.Counterparty, DocumentSalesOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentSalesOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentSalesOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentSalesOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentSalesOrder.Company, DocumentSalesOrder.Responsible, DocumentSalesOrder.Project, DocumentSalesOrder.Event, DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState, DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus AS OrderStateState, CASE WHEN (DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentSalesOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentSalesOrder.SalesStructuralUnit, DocumentSalesOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentSalesOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentSalesOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentSalesOrder.Cell, DocumentSalesOrder.PointInTime, CASE WHEN DocumentSalesOrder.Posted AND DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0)) * 100 / DocumentSalesOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.PaymentAmount, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AdvanceAmount, 0) AS PaymentAmountTurnover FROM Document.SalesOrder AS DocumentSalesOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentSalesOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.Order AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentSalesOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.Order AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentSalesOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.Quote AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderPayments AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentSalesOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.Quote
